SEARCH

Package io.foldright.cffu

package io.foldright.cffu
A tiny 0-dependency sidekick library for CompletableFuture to improve user experience and reduce misuse.

the core class is Cffu.

See Also:
  • Cffu
  • CffuFactory
  • CffuFactoryBuilder
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    io.foldright.cffu.tuple
    the Tuple util classes for Cffu use.
  • Class
    Description
    Cffu<T>
    This class Cffu is the equivalent class to CompletableFuture, contains the equivalent instance methods of CompletionStage and CompletableFuture.
    CffuFactory
    This class CffuFactory is equivalent to CompletableFuture, contains the static factory methods of CompletableFuture.
    CffuFactoryBuilder
    CffuFactoryBuilder is the builder of CffuFactory.
    CffuState
    Same as Future.State, existed for java version compatibility, Cffu.cffuState() to Cffu.state().
    CompletableFutureUtils
    This class contains some enhanced methods for CompletableFuture.
